video.title: Friday Night Lights
video.synopsis: Eric Taylor faces enormous pressure when he signs on as the new coach of a small-town Texas football team that's poised to win the state championship.

episodes.synopsis: New head coach Eric Taylor finds his every move scrutinized as he takes over leadership of Texas's No. 1 high school football team.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: With Jason seriously injured, Matt must step up and become the team's first-string quarterback, a role that he doesn't seem suited for initially.
episodes.title: Eyes Wide Open

episodes.synopsis: The Panthers suffer a humiliating loss, which puts added pressure on the entire team. Lyla tries to help Jason believe that he will walk again.
episodes.title: Wind Sprints

episodes.synopsis: Rivalry week brings vandalism from opponents at Arnett Mead. Heralded quarterback Ray Tatom takes over for Matt but is unwelcomed by some players.
episodes.title: Who's Your Daddy

episodes.synopsis: Lyla and Tim spend more time with each other while things heat up between Tyra and Connor. New arrival Ray insists on being the starting quarterback.
episodes.title: Git 'Er Done

episodes.synopsis: After his arrest for beating up a student, Reyes tries to cover up the truth. Tim springs Jason from rehab and takes him to see a beautiful lake.
episodes.title: El Accidente

episodes.synopsis: Smash feels pressure to back up his bold claims about his football skills. Tim tries to give up drinking just as Tyra plans a huge homecoming party.
episodes.title: Homecoming

episodes.synopsis: Despite warnings from doctors, Jason prepares for his first quad rugby game. Smash works with Matt at a fast-food joint to get money for steroids.
episodes.title: Crossing the Line

episodes.synopsis: Lyla confesses to Jason that she slept with Tim, and rumors quickly spread. Matt takes Julie to the movies and tries to use his clout as quarterback.
episodes.title: Full Hearts

episodes.synopsis: Lyla's indiscretion with Tim affects the squad's preparations for the cheerleading competition. Jason returns from rehab still unable to forgive Lyla.
episodes.title: It's Different for Girls

episodes.synopsis: Unable to adjust to life in a wheelchair, Jason lashes out at his mom. Tami pressures Tim to do his own school work or risk being benched.
episodes.title: Nevermind

episodes.synopsis: The Panthers await game results between two rivals that will determine their own playoff fate. Jason's parents file a lawsuit against Coach Taylor.
episodes.title: What to Do While You're Waiting

episodes.synopsis: Smash's mom reports his steroid use, throwing his entire football career into jeopardy. Jason is jealous when Lyla meets with a college student.
episodes.title: Little Girl I Wanna Marry You

episodes.synopsis: Tim tracks down his estranged father. Coach Taylor faces pressure to let star running back Smash play in the upcoming playoff game.
episodes.title: Upping the Ante

episodes.synopsis: Coach Mac's racist comment leads to increased tension in the school. Trya and Julie get in trouble and must sign up to play in the powder puff game.
episodes.title: Blinders

episodes.synopsis: Black players refuse to play in protest, forcing the coach to use junior varsity players. Matt tries to win back Julie, who's getting closer to Tyra.
episodes.title: Black Eyes and Broken Hearts

episodes.synopsis: Determined to lose her virginity, Julie lets Matt know that she wants to sleep with him. Tim's dad is accused of stealing a team video camera.
episodes.title: I Think We Should Have Sex

episodes.synopsis: Buddy's affair with Tyra's mom is revealed, forcing him to the Taylor's couch. Lyla visits Jason in Austin and meets his new friends.
episodes.title: Extended Families

episodes.synopsis: When Jason's hopes of going to the Paralympics are dashed, Suzie comforts him. Coach Taylor tells his family that they are moving to Austin.
episodes.title: Ch-ch-ch-ch-changes

episodes.synopsis: A chemical spill leaves the football field unusable for the semifinal game. Coach Taylor tries to find out who gave Matt an illegal cash gift.
episodes.title: Mud Bowl

episodes.synopsis: Coach Taylor is pressured by his wife to decline the head coaching job at Texas Methodist University. Tim hides his relationship with Jackie from Bo.
episodes.title: Best Laid Plans

episodes.synopsis: Amid rumors of Coach Taylor taking the TMU job, the Panthers try to focus on their state title game. Both Tim and Tyra commit his VIP game tickets.
episodes.title: State

episodes.synopsis: Coach Taylor hurries back to Dillon when Tami's water breaks and is amazed by how much the town, his family, and the team have changed.
episodes.title: Last Days of Summer

episodes.synopsis: Tami learns to juggle raising a needy newborn and a troublesome teen, and Landry adjusts to sharing the spotlight with a promising new player.
episodes.title: Bad Ideas

episodes.synopsis: On the night of the Panthers' first game of the season, the tension between Smash and Matt boils over -- on and off the field.
episodes.title: Are You Ready for Friday Night?

episodes.synopsis: When an experimental medical procedure in Mexico offers Jason a slim chance of walking again, Tim accompanies him South of the Border.
episodes.title: Backfire

episodes.synopsis: Coach Taylor realizes the town and the team can manage without him and returns to Dillon as head coach of the Panthers.
episodes.title: Let's Get It On

episodes.synopsis: Unable to hide the truth any longer, Landry reluctantly confesses to his father about the murder.
episodes.title: How Did I Get Here

episodes.synopsis: On the first day of recruitment, Smash weighs his college options and favors more exposure by NFL scouts over the promise of a solid education.
episodes.title: Pantherama!

episodes.synopsis: Landry agrees to meet with the brother of the man he murdered, and Matt manages to mess up two important relationships.
episodes.title: Seeing Other People

episodes.synopsis: Landry overcomes his fear and comes clean about the murder of the man who assaulted Tyra.
episodes.title: The Confession

episodes.synopsis: When a tornado destroys the football field of a rival team, Coach Taylor allows them to share the Panthers' field and locker room.
episodes.title: There Goes the Neighborhood

episodes.synopsis: With the biggest game of the season approaching, Coach Taylor can't escape the town's endless number of armchair quarterbacks.
episodes.title: Jumping the Gun

episodes.synopsis: Just as Matt realizes he's in love with Carlotta, she breaks his heart and returns to Guatemala.
episodes.title: Who Do You Think You Are?

episodes.synopsis: A violent confrontation results in Smash's arrest. To avoid criminal prosecution, he's is forced to make a difficult public apology.
episodes.title: Humble Pie

episodes.synopsis: Julie grows increasingly jealous of the mother-daughter type of relationship between Tami and Tyra.
episodes.title: Leave No One Behind

episodes.synopsis: Coach Taylor becomes jealous when an old flame of Tami's arrives in town to reminisce about the old days... and possibly do a little more.
episodes.title: May the Best Man Win

episodes.synopsis: The press grills Coach Taylor about the upcoming season as the teachers grill his wife about the budget and necessary cutbacks.
episodes.title: I Knew You When

episodes.synopsis: When Coach Taylor realizes that it's not Smash's knee that's holding him back, he comes up with a rather unique way of laying it all on the line.
episodes.title: Tami Knows Best

episodes.synopsis: Coach Taylor feels pressured when the boosters corner him at the annual barbecue.
episodes.title: How the Other Half Lives

episodes.synopsis: Coach Taylor asks himself whether he should shake things up when it comes to his quarterback controversy.
episodes.title: Hello, Goodbye

episodes.synopsis: Jason and Tim come up with an idea that will, hopefully, get them out of their financial woes, but Buddy stands in the way.
episodes.title: Every Rose Has Its Thorn

episodes.synopsis: After witnessing a hazing incident involving his new quarterback, Coach Taylor gives his team captain the job of making J. D. feel more comfortable.
episodes.title: It Ain't Easy Being J.D. McCoy

episodes.synopsis: Coach Taylor has difficulties in the relationship between his new starting quarterback and the kid's father.
episodes.title: Keeping Up Appearances

episodes.synopsis: Tami considers new living surroundings, while Eric considers a temporary replacement for Mac, who collapses on the field during practice.
episodes.title: New York, New York

episodes.synopsis: Lyla is put off when Tim puts off a college recruiter. Tyra is put off by Cash's actions when they go out on the road together.
episodes.title: Game of the Week

episodes.synopsis: Buddy loses his cool over a deal gone sour and wrecks the local strip joint, which causes Lyla to lose her cool and walk out on him.
episodes.title: The Giving Tree

episodes.synopsis: Buddy tries to use Tim to get to Lyla, who's still mad about losing her college fund to a business deal.
episodes.title: A Hard Rain's Gonna Fall

episodes.synopsis: The Taylors are faced with a decision that could end what is already a fragile friendship with the McCoys.
episodes.title: Underdogs

episodes.synopsis: Eric's contract is up for discussion, Lyla and Tim talk about their future together, and Mindy and Billy's wedding day has finally come.
episodes.title: Tomorrow Blues

episodes.synopsis: Coach Taylor wonders how low his fortunes can sink as he struggles to pull the East Dillon Lions together.
episodes.title: East of Dillon

episodes.synopsis: A controversy at West Dillon puts star player Luke Cafferty on the Lions' roster.
episodes.title: After the Fall

episodes.synopsis: Coach betrays Tami's trust when the Lions need new uniforms. Tensions between Vince and Luke threaten the team's already meager chances on the field.
episodes.title: In the Skin of a Lion

episodes.synopsis: Homecoming at the newly reopened school prompts Coach Taylor to investigate East Dillon's history. Elsewhere, Tami feels the wrath of the boosters.
episodes.title: A Sort of Homecoming

episodes.synopsis: Vince feels conflicted by the adulation he receives as a star football player and the criminal activity he engages in to support his family.
episodes.title: The Son

episodes.synopsis: Facing the Lions' toughest opponent yet, Coach searches for a strategy to shut down its fabled "juggernaut offense."
episodes.title: Stay

episodes.synopsis: Coach suspects that Vince has brought a gun to school, while Tami unwinds at a party with the West Dillon faculty.
episodes.title: In the Bag

episodes.synopsis: The Lions play the worst team in the league, leading people to dub the mismatch "the Toilet Bowl."
episodes.title: Toilet Bowl

episodes.synopsis: Coach Taylor and Buddy crusade to make an West Dillon park safer for the players. While the coach helps his team, Tami feels distant from her husband.
episodes.title: The Lights in Carroll Park

episodes.synopsis: Coach Taylor is urged by Big Mary to find a new way to lead his team. When Becky goes to Tim for help, he puts Tami in an uncomfortable situation.
episodes.title: I Can't

episodes.synopsis: Tami must defend her job and her actions when a parent asks for her termination as principal of East Dillon.
episodes.title: Injury List

episodes.synopsis: Tensions in town run high as the highly anticipated Panthers-Lions game approaches, and Taylor tells Luke he won't be playing.
episodes.title: Laboring

episodes.synopsis: The Taylors host Thanksgiving dinner, and Luke gets an offer that could take him away from the Lions.
episodes.title: Thanksgiving

episodes.synopsis: While Coach Taylor tempers high expectations for East Dillon's impending season, Tami becomes frustrated in her new job as guidance counselor.
episodes.title: Expectations

episodes.synopsis: Coach Taylor learns that not everyone is pleased by the Lions' strong showing in the season opener, and Luke's aggressive play has consequences.
episodes.title: On the Outside Looking In

episodes.synopsis: When an embarrassing video shot at a rowdy party circulates and mars the Lions' reputation, Coach Taylor struggles to impose discipline on his team.
episodes.title: The Right Hand of the Father

episodes.synopsis: Coach Taylor is forced to play mediator as tensions erupt in the locker room, and Texas Methodist University recruits Luke.
episodes.title: Keep Looking

episodes.synopsis: Coach Taylor discusses recruitment regulations with Vince and his father. Meanwhile, Julie's inappropriate relationship becomes more complicated.
episodes.title: Kingdom

episodes.synopsis: A popular magazine hails Coach Taylor as a "kingmaker." Meanwhile, Luke reacts to the truth about Texas Methodist University.
episodes.title: Swerve

episodes.synopsis: Rivalry week stirs up controversy when a Web site makes an embarrassing disclosure about the Lions' players.
episodes.title: Perfect Record

episodes.synopsis: Coach Taylor fears that he's beginning to lose his grip on the Lions when Vince's arrogance alienates his teammates.
episodes.title: Fracture

episodes.synopsis: Coach Taylor threatens to bench Vince to regain control of the team, forcing Luke to face the daunting prospect of becoming top quarterback.
episodes.title: Gut Check

episodes.synopsis: A college with an elite football program attempts to lure Coach Taylor away from East Dillon, and Vince vows to earn back his starting spot.
episodes.title: Don't Go

episodes.synopsis: Coach Taylor feels threatened as East Dillon faces severe budget cuts, and Tami flies to Pennsylvania for the opportunity of a lifetime.
episodes.title: The March

episodes.synopsis: Coach Taylor is offered a deal he can't refuse, and Tim assesses his future plans when a former flame returns to Dillon.
episodes.title: Texas Whatever

episodes.synopsis: While the Lions prepare for the state championship game, the Taylors face several decisions that could change their lives forever.
episodes.title: Always
